src:
Rosenborg-marerittet fortsetter - n√¶rmer seg negativ rekord
Rosenborg kom til kort mot effektive Sporting Lisboa og st√•r n√• med 14 strake kamper i Europaligaen uten seier.
07 Nov 2019, 19:45 by Anne-Marit Dahl

LERKENDAL: Rosenborg - Sporting Lisboa 0‚Äì2 (0‚Äì2)

F√∏r torsdagens kamp mot gjestene fra Portugal sto Rosenborg med 13 kamper i Europaligaen uten seier. Sist triumf kom p√• eget gress tilbake i september 2017. Da ble Vardar sl√•tt 3-1 p√• Lerkendal.
Yr rapporterte om fem kuldegrader p√• Nils Arne Eggens plass, s√• det var et kj√∏lig Lerkendal stadion som ventet Rosenborg og Sporting Lisboa denne novemberkvelden.

¬´Ett √•r uten denne pinen kan faktisk v√¶re greit¬ª


Fakta: Europa League torsdag, 4. runde:


Gruppe D:


Rosenborg ‚Äì Sporting Lisboa (Portugal) 0-2 (0-2), LASK (√òsterrike) ‚Äì PSV Eindhoven (Nederland) 4-1 (0-1).


Gruppe A:


APOEL (Kypros) ‚Äì Qarabag (Kasakhstan) 2-1 (0-1), Dudelange (Luxembourg) ‚Äì Sevilla (Spania) 2-5 (0-4).


Gruppe B:


FC K√∏benhavn (Danmark) ‚Äì Dinamo Kiev (Ukraina) 1-1 (1-0), Lugano (Sveits) ‚Äì Malm√∂ (Sverige) 0-0.


Gruppe C:


Basel (Sveits) ‚Äì Getafe (Spania) 2-1 (1-1), Krasnodar (Russland) ‚Äì Trabzonspor (Tyrkia) 3-1 (2-0).


Gruppe E:


Cluj (Romania) ‚Äì Rennes (Frankrike) 1-0- (0-0), Lazio (Italia) ‚Äì Celtic (Skottland) 1-2 (1-1).


Gruppe F:


Standard Li√®ge (Belgia) ‚Äì Eintracht Frankfurt (Tyskland) 2-1 (0-0).
Spilt onsdag: Vit√≥ria Guimar√£es (Portugal) ‚Äì Arsenal (England) 1-1.


Gruppe G:


Feyenoord (Nederland) ‚Äì Young Boys (Sveits) 1-1 (1-0), Rangers (Skottland) ‚Äì Porto (Portugal) 2-0 (0-0).


Gruppe H:


Espanyol (Spania) ‚Äì Ludogorets (Bulgaria) 6-0 (3-0), Ferencvaros (Ungarn) ‚Äì CSKA Moskva (Russland) 0-0.


Gruppe I:


Olexandrija (Ukraina) ‚Äì Saint-√âtienne (Frankrike) 2-2 (0-1), Wolfsburg (Tyskland) ‚Äì Gent (Belgia) 1-3 (1-0).


Gruppe J:


Borussia M√∂nchengladbach (Tyskland) ‚Äì Roma (Italia) 2-1 (1-0), Wolfsberg (√òsterrike) ‚Äì Basaksehir (Tyrkia) 0-3 (0-0).


Gruppe K:


Braga (Portugal) ‚Äì Besiktas (Tyrkia) 3-1 (2-1), Wolverhampton (England) ‚Äì Slovan Bratislava (Slovakia) 1-0 (0-0).


Gruppe L:


Astana (Kasakhstan) ‚Äì AZ Alkmaar (Nederland) 0-5 (0-1), Manchester U. (England) ‚Äì Partizan Beograd (Serbia) 3-0 (2-0).

Skulle angripe
‚Äì Vi skal ut √• angripe og skjerpe effektiviteten foran m√•l, sa assistenttrener Trond Henriksen fra indre bane f√∏r avspark.
Han fortalte om et lag som ville ta kontrollen p√• eget gress, og Lerkendal-publikum, i alt 11.018 stykker, fikk se Rosenborg spille seg til kampens f√∏rste corner.


Rosenborg jaktet sin f√∏rste seier i Europaligaen i denne h√∏stens gruppespill, men m√∏tte en effektiv motstander i Sporting Lisboa. RBK har n√• spilt 14 kamper i Europaligaen uten seier.üì∑ Christine Schefte

Men s√• var det effektiviteten foran motstanderens m√•l, da. Rosenborg slet med √• omsette spill i sjanser i √•pningsminuttene, mens gjestene var d√∏delig effektive.
En god redning fra Andr√© Hansen ga Sporting corner da kvarteret var spilt. Den fant veien til Luis Neto som slo et presist innlegg til Sebastian Coates. Midtstopperen headet ballen upresset i m√•l fra seks meter, og Sporting tok ledelsen i kampens 16. minutt.
Rosenborg ville ha utligning og fikk l√∏ftet laget. Alexander S√∏derlund dundret til p√• et frispark fra cirka 25 meter litt f√∏r halvtimen var spilt. Men skuddet var keepermat for Ribeiro i Sporting-m√•let, og ingen RBK-spillere maktet √• sette returen mellom stengene.

Horneland gjorde overraskende valg f√∏r kampen



Anders Trondsen hadde en stor mulighet til √• score i f√∏rsteomgangen, men ballen fant aldri veien til nettmaskene for Rosenborg mot Sporting Lisboa.üì∑ Christine Schefte

Utnyttet RBK-feil
Det siste kvarteret f√∏r pause kom Rosenborg seg til flere innlegg foran m√•l, men historien gjentok seg: De lyktes ikke med √• omsette dem til m√•l.
Det ble for upresist, og akkurat det straffet seg hardt da Marius Lundemo ga bort ballen p√• vei mot midtbanen. Balltapet gjorde at Sporting plutselig var i overtall p√• RBKs 16-meter, og Bruno Fernandes doblet enkelt gjestenes ledelse i det 38. minutt.
Med to baklengsm√•l i fleisen, m√•tte Rosenborg angripe et gjestende lag som la seg lavt og jaktet kontringer etter hvilen. Tore Reginiussen var farlig framp√• p√• en tidlig corner, men heller ikke denne gangen ville det seg for vertene.
Friskere etter pause
I det 62.minutt steg jubelen p√• Lerkendal for headingen til Samuel Adegbenro. Men det som s√• ut til √• v√¶re en etterlengtet redusering, ble i stedet nok en ball som Sporting-forsvaret fikk klarert.

Sjekk lista: Kan bli full ryddesjau i RBK etter nedturen



Rosenborg jaktet redusering p√• Lerkendal, men gjestene fra Portugal holdt unna.üì∑ Christine Schefte

Det var et friskt Rosenborg som hadde initativet i kampens siste halvdel. Eirik Horneland gjorde to offensive bytter de siste 14 minuttene ved √• gi Bj√∏rn Maars Johnsen og P√•l Andr√© Helland tillit i stedet for Samuel Adegbenro og Anders Trondsen, og h√•pet nok p√• √• f√• slutt p√• m√•lt√∏rken.
Maars Johnsen markerte seg umiddelbart med en heading p√• m√•l, men keeper hadde kontroll denne gangen ogs√•.
Marius Lundemos skudd i stolpen fem minutter f√∏r slutt var det n√¶rmeste Rosenborg kom en scoring. Rosenborg tapte dermed 0‚Äì2 p√• Lerkendal.
Tapet mot Sporting gj√∏r at Eirik Hornelands lag kun er et tap d√•rligere enn tapsrekka til kypriotiske Apollon Limassol. De har rekorden i antall kamper uten seier i Europaligaen. Den lyder p√• 15.
Rosenborg er tabelljumbo i Europaligaens gruppe D med null poeng p√• fire kamper.
text:
The Rosenborg nightmare continues - approaching negative record
Rosenborg fell short of effective Sporting Lisbon and now stands with 14 tight matches in the Europa League without victory.
07 Nov 2019, 19:45 by Anne-Marit Dahl

LERKENDAL: Rosenborg - Sporting Lisbon 0‚Äì2 (0‚Äì2)

Before Thursday's game against the guests from Portugal, Rosenborg stood with 13 matches in the Europa League without victory. The last triumph came back on its own grass in September 2017. Then Vardar was beaten 3-1 at Lerkendal.
Yr reported about five degrees of cold at Nils Arne Eggens place, so it was a cool Lerkendal stadium awaiting Rosenborg and Sporting Lisbon this November evening.

"One year without this pain might actually be fine"


Facts: Europa League Thursday, 4th round:


Group D:


Rosenborg - Sporting Lisbon (Portugal) 0-2 (0-2), LASK (Austria) - PSV Eindhoven (Netherlands) 4-1 (0-1).


Group A:


APOEL (Cyprus) - Qarabag (Kazakhstan) 2-1 (0-1), Dudelange (Luxembourg) - Seville (Spain) 2-5 (0-4).


Group B:


FC Copenhagen (Denmark) - Dinamo Kiev (Ukraine) 1-1 (1-0), Lugano (Switzerland) - Malm√∂ (Sweden) 0-0.


Group C:


Basel (Switzerland) - Getafe (Spain) 2-1 (1-1), Krasnodar (Russia) - Trabzonspor (Turkey) 3-1 (2-0).


Group E:


Cluj (Romania) - Rennes (France) 1-0- (0-0), Lazio (Italy) - Celtic (Scotland) 1-2 (1-1).


Group F:


Standard Liege (Belgium) - Eintracht Frankfurt (Germany) 2-1 (0-0).
Played Wednesday: Vit√≥ria Guimar√£es (Portugal) - Arsenal (England) 1-1.


Group G:


Feyenoord (Netherlands) - Young Boys (Switzerland) 1-1 (1-0), Rangers (Scotland) - Porto (Portugal) 2-0 (0-0).


Group H:


Espanyol (Spain) - Ludogorets (Bulgaria) 6-0 (3-0), Ferencvaros (Hungary) - CSKA Moscow (Russia) 0-0.


Group I:


Olexandrija (Ukraine) - Saint-√âtienne (France) 2-2 (0-1), Wolfsburg (Germany) - Ghent (Belgium) 1-3 (1-0).


Group J:


Borussia M√∂nchengladbach (Germany) - Rome (Italy) 2-1 (1-0), Wolfsberg (Austria) - Basaksehir (Turkey) 0-3 (0-0).


Group K:


Braga (Portugal) - Besiktas (Turkey) 3-1 (2-1), Wolverhampton (England) - Slovan Bratislava (Slovakia) 1-0 (0-0).


Group L:


Astana (Kazakhstan) - AZ Alkmaar (Netherlands) 0-5 (0-1), Manchester U. (England) - Partizan Belgrade (Serbia) 3-0 (2-0).

Should attack
"We are going to attack and sharpen efficiency in front of goal," assistant coach Trond Henriksen said from the inner court before kick off.
He told of a team that wanted to take control of their own grass, and the Lerkendal crowd, a total of 11,018 pieces, saw Rosenborg play to the first corner of the match.


Rosenborg hunted his first victory in the Europa League in this fall's group games, but met an effective opponent in Sporting Lisbon. RBK has now played 14 matches in the Europa League without victory.üì∑ Christine Schefte

But then there was the efficiency in front of the opponent's goal, then. Rosenborg struggled to turn games into chances in the opening minutes, while the guests were deadly efficient.
A good save from Andr√© Hansen gave Sporting corner when the neighborhood was played. It found its way to Luis Neto who made a precise post to Sebastian Coates. The center stopper headed the ball unmarked in goal from six yards and Sporting took the lead in the 16th minute.
Rosenborg wanted equalization and got the promise made. Alexander S√∏derlund thundered on a free kick from about 25 meters just before half time was played. But the shot was keeper Ribeiro's goal in the Sporting goal, and no RBK players were able to return between the bars.

Horneland made surprising choices before the match



Anders Trondsen had a great opportunity to score in the first half, but the ball never found its way to the net masks for Rosenborg against Sporting Lisboa. Christine Schefte

Utilized RBK error
The last quarter before the break, Rosenborg reached several posts in front of goal, but the story repeated: They failed to translate them into goals.
Things were going to get worse for the visitors, and Marius Lundemo made a spectacular save. The ball landed at the feet of RBK's 16 meters, and Bruno Fernandes easily doubled the visitors' lead.
With two goals in the back, Rosenborg had to attack a visiting team that lay low and chased counter-attacks for rest. Tore Reginiussen was dangerous on an early corner, but this time neither would the hosts.
Healthier after the break
In the 62nd minute, the cheer of Lerkendal rose for the header to Samuel Adegbenro. But what appeared to be a long-awaited reduction was instead another ball cleared by the Sporting defense.

Check list: Can become full tidy sheep in RBK after the downturn



Rosenborg hunted a reduction on Lerkendal, but the guests from Portugal stayed away.üì∑ Christine Schefte

It was a fresh Rosenborg who had the initiative in the last half of the match. Eirik Horneland made two offensive switches in the last 14 minutes by giving Bj√∏rn Maars Johnsen and P√•l Andr√© Helland confidence in place of Samuel Adegbenro and Anders Trondsen, and hoped to end the goal drought.
Maars Johnsen immediately headed for a goal on goal, but the keeper had control this time as well.
Marius Lundemo's shot in the bar five minutes before the end was the closest Rosenborg came a scoring. Rosenborg thus lost 0‚Äì2 at Lerkendal.
The loss to Sporting means that Eirik Horneland's team is only one loss worse than the loss series to the Cypriot Apollon Limassol. They have the record in the number of matches without victory in the Europa League. It sounds at 15.
Rosenborg is a table jumbo in the European League's Group D with zero points in four games.
